detail_desc: Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, fitted dress in airy jersey with a sheen. V-neck, draping at the bust, and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short, wide sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, drawstring sleeves. Seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, drawstring sleeves. Seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a broderie anglaise yoke and short, frilled collar. Concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frilled broderie anglaise trim at the cuffs.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Satin lining.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Satin lining.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Satin lining.

Longer-style top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves, inset lace sections at the top of the front, and a rounded hem.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a fringed hem.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a fringed hem.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a fringed hem.
Trousers in patterned satin with a high waist, concealed zip and a button at the back, and wide, softly draping legs.
Sleeveless, double-layered top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Sleeveless, double-layered top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Short V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Trousers in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a high waist, tie belt and zip fly with a concealed button. Pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a high waist, tie belt and zip fly with a concealed button. Pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Long, flared dress in a patterned weave. Narrow cut at the top with a slim band at the neckline, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Satin lining.

Long, flared dress in a patterned weave. Narrow cut at the top with a slim band at the neckline, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Satin lining.
Double-layered, straight-cut top in airy chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Double-layered, straight-cut top in airy chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Flared, calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and a small stand-up collar with long ties at the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves and wide tiers to the hem. Lined.
Flared, calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and a small stand-up collar with long ties at the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves and wide tiers to the hem. Lined.

Long dress in a crêpe weave with embroidered, scalloped edges. Double-layered bodice,an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length, gently flared sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined with a shorter, V-neck dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Sleeveless blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with a V-neck, seam under the bust and flare to the hem. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with a V-neck, seam under the bust and flare to the hem. Lined.
Short, one-shoulder, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a knot at the top of the shoulder strap. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide, elasticated flounced trim. Seam below the bust and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Calf-length, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt with a raw-edge, scalloped hem. Jersey lining.

Calf-length, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt with a raw-edge, scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Wide shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with a concealed zip in one side.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric made from a viscose blend with a high waist, pleats at the top and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, diagonal side pockets and straight legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Boxy shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, flap chest pockets and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and short sleeves.
Boxy shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, flap chest pockets and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and short sleeves.

Joggers in airy cotton poplin. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, zip fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Joggers in airy cotton poplin. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, zip fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a padded edge and tongue and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a padded edge and tongue and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a padded edge and tongue and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Sandals in matt imitation leather with adjustable straps over the foot with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Wrapover body in cotton jersey with lace trims at the front, a V-neck front and back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, detachable shoulder tabs, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a pleat at the back of the hem. Lined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, detachable shoulder tabs, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a pleat at the back of the hem. Lined.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Shirt in softly draping twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, yoke at the back, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
